abstract: PetroChina is selling its stake in a gas pipeline operator to the Kunlun Energy Company for $2.85 billion, the latest in a flurry of energy deals.
snippet: PetroChina is selling its stake in a gas pipeline operator to the Kunlun Energy Company for $2.85 billion, the latest in a flurry of energy deals.
lead_paragraph: PetroChina agreed on Tuesday to sell its stake in a gas pipeline operator to the Kunlun Energy Company for $2.85 billion, the latest in a flurry of energy deals.

headline.main: PetroChina to Sell Gas Pipeline Stake for $2.85 Billion
